definitions.definition: An affirmative expression; an answer that shows agreement or acceptance.
A vote of support or in favor/favour of something.
definitions.example: The workers voted on whether to strike, and there were thirty "yeses" and one "no".

definitions.definition: To attempt to flatter someone by habitually agreeing
Used to express pleasure, joy, or great excitement.
definitions.example: Our second goal of the match! Yes!

definitions.definition: Response that confirms that the user is paying attention.
